name: Gulp
long_description: We're building a platform that streamlines the process of building, testing, and deploying real-time data pipelines. Engineers have a hard time building real-time/streaming data pipelines (i.e. Apache Spark, Flink, Beam) due to the unique challenges that come with unbounded data - Gulp abstracts away the complexities and turns work that takes days into just minutes.
one_liner: Automating generation + deployment for real-time data pipelines
